Bash(COMMUNITY" section to show fake content on first load.

Changes:
- Initialize videos state with empty array instead of mockVideos
- Add loading state management
- Remove mockVideos fallback completely
- Homepage now shows ONLY: Ceramic + Bluesky + Local uploads
- Empty state handled by CommunitySection component

This ensures no mock data ever appears on production, even during initial load.

Bash(Connected Accounts", their custom uploads were overwritten with 
  Bluesky/Twitter images
- Users lost their custom artwork after syncing

Solution:
- Modified sync-profile API to check for existing custom uploads
- Detects custom images by checking for Livepeer IPFS URLs
- Only overwrites avatar/banner if user is using default or no image
- Preserves custom description field
- Updated UI help text to clarify custom images are preserved

Changes:
- src/app/api/creator/sync-profile/route.ts:
  - Fetch existing creator profile before syncing
  - Check if avatar/banner contain Livepeer URLs \(custom uploads\)
  - Preserve custom content, only sync empty/default fields
  
- src/app/\(platform\)/settings/page.tsx:
  - Updated help text to inform users custom uploads are preserved

Testing:
1. User uploads custom avatar → saves successfully
2. User clicks "Import from Connected Accounts"
3. Custom avatar is preserved, only empty fields are filled

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
